column2: ITP approved for use by: Victor Mira
Reference: IFC Drawings L1-CHE-STD-005, L1-CHE-STD-025, VicRoads Section 610, VicRoads Section 630
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete Mix is Registered with VicRoads. 32MPa concrete to be used as per IFC drawings.
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: Supplier Certificate of Compliance
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All Steel must comply with Australian Standards.
○ Steel section sizes must be checked on site.
○ Steel posts to be CHS with a grade of C250
METHOD: Document review, Visual and Measure
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: Supplier Certificate of Compliance
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey to set out the following but not limited to: existing services, post locations, refuge bays
○ Offset checked against the running edge prior to installation of posts.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Excavation for post foundation must not undermine footing of existing structures.
○ Follow asset owners guidelines for work around their service.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All post (fence and gate) foundations to be inspected by the site team prior to installing the posts. All foundations are to be free of water and loose material.
○ If the ground material on site does not meet the design assumptions, the Geotechnical Engineer shall be notified to determine if design change is required.
○ Footings as per IFC drawings or standard design to match existing.
○ Refer to IFC drawing for reinforcement details.
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: Post and concrete dockets
METHOD: Maximum post spacing to be 3.25m ± 250mm.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Chain-wire mesh to match existing and or IFC drawings
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: This ITP, Delivery dockets
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per standard drawings and or IFC drawings
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: Post and Concrete Dockets
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per standard drawings and or IFC drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As per standard drawings and or IFC drawings

On behalf of Metropolitan Roads Program Alliance, it is hereby certified that the Works represented by the item of work listed have been tested in accordance with the Project Quality Plan and conform in all respects with the requirements of the Contract.
